block.p: In the following reports, the listed at price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent list
Number of bedrooms Number of full bathrooms Number of half bathrooms Weeks on market
*Sale in this price category not available.
635-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; renovated eat-in kitchen and marble bath, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $440, 39% tax deductible; listed at $264,500. Broker: Edel Family Management.

515-sq.-ft. alcove studio co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, separate dressing area, refinished h/w floors, balcony; maintenance $746, 55% tax deductible; listed at $445,000. Broker: Citi Habitats.

1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, wall of windows, river view; maintenance $2,045, 67% tax deductible; listed at $825,000 (multiple bids). Brokers: Bellmarc; Century 21 New York Metro.

750-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, high ceilings, marble baths, park view; maintenance $1,238, 52% tax deductible; listed at $995,000. Brokers: Buchbinder & Warren; Ann Weintraub.

1,190-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, granite counters, washer/dryer, terrace; common charge $1,104; taxes $12,360; listed at $1.8 million. Broker: Citi Habitats.
690-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; dining area, c/a, h/w floors, assigned parking space; common charge $390; taxes $1,648; listed at $247,000. Broker: Salmon Real Estate.

1,180-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, foyer, renovated kitchen and baths, c/a, balcony, river view; maintenance $961, 45% tax deductible; listed at $499,000. Brokers: Trebach; John Edwards.
2-story wood 2-family; each unit: 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, renovated eat-in kitchen, h/w floors; 2-car garage, 70-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,828; listed at $725,888, Broker: Re/Max Millennium.

3-story brick 2-family; primary duplex: 3 bedrooms, 11/2 baths, dining room, c/a, deck, garden; simplex: 2 bedrooms, 1 bath; 1-car garage, 22-by-103-ft. lot; taxes $4,080; listed at $975,000. Broker: Warren Lewis.

4-story 5-unit brownstone; primary triplex: 5 bedrooms, 4 baths, dining room; simplexes: 1 w/2 bedrooms, 3 w/1 bedroom, 1 bath each; 25-by-95-ft. lot; taxes $34,682; listed at $4.2 million. Broker: Brooklyn Heights.

900-sq.-ft. co-op in a 57-year-old building; L-shaped dining room, efficiency kitchen, gym and party room in building; maintenance $795, 62% tax deductible; listed at $215,000. Brokers: Fairfield; Coldwell Banker.

6-year-old Victorian-style house; eat-in kitchen, master suite, mudroom, porch, deck, 0.49-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $6,305; listed at $475,000. Brokers: Prudential Douglas Elliman; Southampton South Fork.

38-year-old colonial; den w/fireplace, granite counters, deck, basement, 2-car garage, 0.25-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $8,397; listed at $579,000 (multiple bids). Broker: Daniel Gale Sotheby's; Edna Mashaal.

57-year-old contemporary; pool, living-room fireplace, den, floor-to-ceiling windows, master suite, 2-car garage, 0.53-acre lot; taxes $13,938; listed at $1.299 million. Broker: Daniel Gale Sotheby's; Coldwell Banker.

6-year-old Mediterranean-style villa; 100 feet on ocean, heated pool, 26-ft. living-room ceiling, media room, master suite w/fireplace and sauna, 1.51-acre lot; taxes $30,918; listed at $6.8 million. Broker: Brown Harris Stevens.
875-sq.-ft. co-op in a 40-year-old midrise; new kitchen and bath, office/dining area; maintenance $517, 50% tax deductible; listed at $165,000. Brokers: Houlihan & O'Malley; Barhite & Holzinger.

7-year-old town house; eat-in kitchen, large family room with sliding doors to patio, view of woods, 0.01-acre lot on cul-de-sac; taxes $7,672; listed at $375,000. Broker: Coldwell Banker Residential.

50-year-old split-level; new kitchen, greenhouse window, vaulted ceilings, parklike property, 1-car garage, 0.34-acre lot; taxes $12,176; listed at $699,000. Brokers: Century 21 Haviland; Prudential Rand.

34-year-old colonial; foyer, high ceilings, new master bath, family-room fireplace, c/a, electronic fence, sprinklers, 0.22-acre lot, taxes $21,056; listed at $1.095 million. Brokers: Houlihan Lawrence; Prudential Rand.

31-year-old colonial; 2-story foyer, fireplaces in living and family rooms, back stairs, media room, 1.21-acre lot; taxes $27,978; listed at $1.995 million. Brokers: Houlihan Lawrence; Prudential Holmes & Kennedy.
10-year-old vinyl-sided Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, full basement, 1-car garage, 0.2-acre lot; taxes not available; listed at $279,900. Broker: Coldwell Banker Currier & Lazier; Prudential Rand.
54-year-old brick Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, living-room fireplace, c/a, h/w floors, upgraded electrical system, 1-car garage, 0.29-acre lot; taxes $7,975; listed at $489,000. Broker: Ellis Sotheby's.

20-year-old brick and vinyl-sided center-hall colonial; 2 family rooms, 2 fireplaces, h/w floors, whirlpool, deck, 2-car garage, 1.1-acre lot; taxes $13,200; listed at $769,900. Brokers: Prudential Rand; Weichert.

New vinyl-sided colonial; front porch, family room, den, fireplace, high ceilings, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.44-acre lot; taxes $18,000; listed at $945,000. Brokers: Baer & McIntosh; GMAC Real Estate ServiceMax.

291-year-old stone farmhouse; 10-ft. fireplace in living room, cathedral ceilings, h/w floors, full basement, 62.5 acres; taxes not available; listed at $1.8 million. Brokers: Houlihan Lawrence Lavery; D. L. Hawkins.

50-year-old condominium; renovated in 2001, new kitchen cabinets, refinished h/w floors, storage bin, reserved parking space; common charge $227; taxes $2,875; listed at $284,900. Broker: Coldwell Banker.

80-year-old colonial; renovated in 2005, cook's kitchen, family-room fireplace, sunroom, 2-car garage, 0.11-acre lot; taxes $5,420; listed at $434,900 (multiple bids). Brokers: Jordan Baris; Re/Max Achievers.

New colonial; h/w floors, center-island kitchen w/pantry, master suite, gas fireplaces in living room and great room, 2-car attached garage; 0.22-acre lot; taxes $5,693; listed at $759,900. Broker: Re/Max Legend.

25-year-old split-level colonial; foyer, family room, library w/fireplace, 2 master bedrooms, 2-car attached garage; 0.54-acre lot; taxes $15,602; listed at $949,000. Broker: Century 21 Van Der Wende.

101-year-old Victorian; updated and expanded, new kitchen, breakfast room, period details, high ceilings, pond, barn; 0.75-acre lot; taxes $27,512; listed at $2.785 million (multiple bids). Broker: Lois Schneider.
66-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; screened porch, partly finished basement, c/a, new windows, 1-car garage, 0.16-acre lot; taxes $5,212; listed at $309,000. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

47-year-old wood ranch; renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, living-room fireplace, refinished h/w floors, c/a, deck, hot tub, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $5,799; listed at $499,000. Broker: Coldwell Banker Shaker.

40-year-old wood colonial; stainless-steel appliances, fireplace, h/w floors, new septic and electrical systems, 2-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $8,620; listed at $820,000. Broker: Coldwell Banker Wilton.
58-year-old brick Cape Cod; bow window, living-room fireplace, solarium, h/w floors, finished basement, 1-car garage, 0.19-acre lot; taxes $4,446; listed at $929,000. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

New wood colonial; family, exercise and media rooms, 2 fireplaces, c/a, terrace, garage, 0.29-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $3.195 million. Brokers: Greenwich Land Co.; Coldwell Banker Greenwich.
